application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: See 2020/03395/TPO for application and drawing, and works to TPO trees1. 1 x Beech - Reduce back from building by 1.5 - 2m, crown lift over road and thin by 10%1. A. 1 x Sorbus - Reduce and reshape by 1.5m, thin and remove deadwood1. B. 1 x Horse Chestnut - Thin by 15% and remove deadwood (TPO/36/13/71)2. 1 x Beech - Thin by 10%, remove deadwood, reduce back from building by 1.5 - 2m, crown lift over road by 5m3. 1 x Beech - Fell to ground level and stump grind4. 1 x Laburnum and 1 x Beech - Remove deadwood and lift over road5. 1 x Purple Plum - Reduce and reshape by 2m, remove deadwood (TPO/246/7/98)6. 1 x Laburnum - Remove deadwood; 7. 1 x Beech Tree - Light thin and remove deadwood8. 1 x Purple Plum - Reduce and reshape by 2m, thin and remove deadwood (TPO/246/7/98)9. 1 x Beech Tree - Remove deadwood10. 1 x Beech - Thin by 15%, reduce back from the phone lines, crown lift 5m and remove deadwood11. 1 x Beech - Thin by 10%, reduce back from building by 2m, reduce back from light column and crown lift over road by 5m12. 1 x Beech - Light thin, remove deadwood and reduce back from building
